Room.Name: Aquaduct Cistern
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing at the bottom of a brick cistern and see an aquaduct tunnel.
Room.LongDescription: Water bubbles from a spring at your feet and flows into a dark tunnel to the east. The tunnel appears to form a brick lined aquaduct. The water is flowing in a steady stream in that direction, but not enough to fill the tunnel. You could wade into the aquaduct if you choose to go that way.
